shortdesc.lang_cn: 查询SNMP XML-RPC接口用户名和密码
shortdesc.lang_en: Query the user and the password for SNMP XML-RPC interface.

description.lang_cn: 查询SNMP XML-RPC接口用户名和密码。如果查询结果返回失败，则返回失败原因。如果查询成功，则返回SNMP XML-RPC接口用户名和密码。
description.lang_en: Query the user and the password for SNMP XML-RPC interface. If the query fail, it will return the fault reason. If the query succeed, it will return the user and the password for SNMP XML-RPC interface.

parameter.name: session
parameter.lang_cn: 登录时由会话管理模块分配的随机字符串。
parameter.lang_en: Random string assigned by session manager at login.

parameter.name: start_index
parameter.lang_cn: 查询起始位置，起始值为0。
parameter.lang_en: query start index, start value is 0.

parameter.name: next_index
parameter.lang_cn: 查询的下条起始位置，-1表示查询结束。
parameter.lang_en: Next Query Index, if value equal -1,query end.

parameter.name: configuration_number
parameter.lang_en: The number of the configuration record.

enum.lang_en: The SNMP configuration database do not exist
Failed to add a record to the SNMP configuration database
Failed to modify the SNMP configuration database
The length of the password exceed the limitation
